metadata.title: Quick Start
metadata.description: Vagrant isolates dependencies and their configuration within a single disposable and consistent development environment.

collection.name: Get Started
collection.description: Vagrant isolates dependencies and their configuration within a single disposable and consistent development environment.

tutorials.name: What is Vagrant?
tutorials.description: Create your first development environment with Vagrant. This quick start provides a brief introduction to Vagrant, its prerequisites, and an overview of three of the most important Vagrant commands to understand.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

tutorials.name: Install Vagrant
tutorials.description: Install Vagrant by visiting the Vagrant downloads page and downloading the appropriate installer or package for your platform. Packages are available for Mac, Windows, and distributions of Linux.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

tutorials.name: Initialize a project directory
tutorials.description: Create a project directory to set up your first Vagrant project. Then initialize the project with a Vagrantfile at its root.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

tutorials.name: Install and specify a box
tutorials.description: Vagrant uses a base image to quickly clone a virtual machine. In this tutorial specify a base image.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

tutorials.name: Boot an environment
tutorials.description: Bring up your first Vagrant environment, and SSH into the machine. Then destroy the virtual machine and remove the stored box.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

tutorials.name: Synchronize local and guest files
tutorials.description: Share files and folders between your local machine and the guest virtual machine to develop in your Vagrant environment while using your own text editor and other tools.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

tutorials.name: Share an environment
tutorials.description:
Now that you have a web server running and accessible from your machine, share
and collaborate on the environment using the Vagrant Share plugin.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

tutorials.name: Rebuild an environment
tutorials.description:
When you are ready to come back to your project, whether it is tomorrow,
a week from now, or a year from now, getting it up and running is easy.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

tutorials.name: Teardown an environment
tutorials.description: Suspend, halt, or destroy your Vagrant development environment.

product.name: Vagrant
product.description: Learn to create development environments with Vagrant

metadata.title: Vagrant by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Vagrant enables users to create and configure lightweight, reproducible, and portable development environments.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.
